tasks.task: Analyze the relationships and parameters for furrow irrigation design.
subtasks: Understand the time components in furrow irrigation (infiltration opportunity, water application, advance, and recession times).
Calculate the net irrigation time using the modified infiltration equation.
Determine the advance time (TT) based on furrow length and stream size.
Compute the average infiltration opportunity time for the furrow length.
Calculate the gross depth of water application using cutoff time and furrow spacing.
Evaluate surface runoff and deep percolation losses by comparing gross depth to net depth.
Assess application efficiency and distribution pattern efficiency.
Explore the cutback system for improved efficiency by adjusting stream size mid-furrow.
Understand the relationship between fractional advance ratio (FAR) and losses to optimize irrigation scheduling.
Apply graphical charts and family curves for designing surface irrigation systems.
